Uses of Class
tripleplay.util.TextConfig

  • Packages that use TextConfig 
    Package Description
    tripleplay.util  

    • Uses of TextConfig in tripleplay.util

      Methods in tripleplay.util that return TextConfig 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TextConfig TextConfig.withAlignment(TextFormat.Alignment align)
      Returns a new text config the alignment configured as specified.
      TextConfig TextConfig.withColor(int textColor)
      Returns a new text config which uses the specified text color.
      TextConfig TextConfig.withFont(Font font)
      Returns a new text config updated to use the specified font.
      TextConfig TextConfig.withFormat(TextFormat format)
      Returns a new text config which uses the specified text format.
      TextConfig TextConfig.withOutline(int outlineColor)
      Returns a new text config which uses a pixel outline effect.
      TextConfig TextConfig.withOutline(int outlineColor, float outlineWidth)
      Returns a new text config which uses a vector outline effect.
      TextConfig TextConfig.withShadow(int shadowColor, float shadowX, float shadowY)
      Returns a new text config which uses a shadow effect.
      TextConfig TextConfig.withUnderline(boolean underlined) 
      TextConfig TextConfig.withWrapping(float wrapWidth, TextFormat.Alignment align)
      Returns a new text config with the wrap width and alignment configured as specified.
      TextConfig TextConfig.withWrapWidth(float wrapWidth)
      Returns a new text config with the wrap width configured as specified.
      Methods in tripleplay.util with parameters of type TextConfig 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Glyph.renderText(TextConfig config, String text)
      Prepares the canvas and renders the supplied text at 0, 0 using the given config.
      void Glyph.renderText(TextConfig config, TextLayout layout)
      Prepares the canvas and renders the supplied layout at 0, 0 using the given config.
